extendedInfo.description: Welcome in the new year with a 2011 ball drop live wallpaper for your background.To install, long press on your home screen and choose Wallpapers > Live Wallpapers > Ball Drop 2011Size and speed options available: For best results, set FPS to 1I have no control over how people are charged. That is up to Google.

reviews.comment: Got charged double on my credit card for this app. Not happy about this.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Cute, simple, love it! Just change fps to 1 and its great. Doesnt drain battery either. Oh and set size to big. Droid 1
reviews.author: A Google User
